snippet: The authorities in Ulster County arrested one of the victim’s co-workers and charged him with second-degree murder. No motive was given for the shooting.
abstract: David N Reese, electrician for New York City’s reservoir system, which is managed by city's Environmental Protection Dept, shoots and kills fellow worker Aron J Thomas at agency's offices in Kingston, NY; police surround building and quickly make arrest.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in Ulster County arrested one of the victim’s co-workers and charged him with second-degree murder. No motive was given for the shooting.

headline.main: Maintainer of City Watershed Fatally Shot, Officials Say
